text: Murmidiidae is a family of beetles in the order Coleoptera, formerly included within the family Cerylonidae. There are at least three genera and about five described species in Murmidiidae. Murmidius ovalis ==Genera== * Botrodus Casey, 1890 * Murmidius Leach, 1822 * Mychocerinus Slipinski, 1990 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * * * Category:Coccinelloidea Category:Polyphaga families
title: Murmidiidae
